description: The AWS::Lambda::EventInvokeConfig resource configures options for asynchronous invocation on a version or an alias.

DestinationConfig.description: A destination for events after they have been sent to a function for processing.
DestinationConfig.markdownDescription:
A destination for events after they have been sent to a function for processing.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

OnFailure.description: The destination configuration for failed invocations.

Destination.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination resource.
Destination.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 350  
Pattern: ^$|arn:(aws[a-zA-Z0-9-]*):([a-zA-Z0-9\-])+:([a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d{1})?:(\d{12})?:(.*)  
Update requires: No interruption

OnFailure.markdownDescription:
The destination configuration for failed invocations.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

OnSuccess.description: The destination configuration for successful invocations.

Destination.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination resource.
Destination.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 350  
Pattern: ^$|arn:(aws[a-zA-Z0-9-]*):([a-zA-Z0-9\-])+:([a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d{1})?:(\d{12})?:(.*)  
Update requires: No interruption

OnSuccess.markdownDescription:
The destination configuration for successful invocations.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FunctionName.description: The name of the Lambda function.
FunctionName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Lambda function.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:)?([a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:)?(\d{12}:)?(function:)?([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)(:(\$LATEST|[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+))?$  
Update requires: Replacement

MaximumEventAgeInSeconds.description: The maximum age of a request that Lambda sends to a function for processing.
MaximumEventAgeInSeconds.markdownDescription:
The maximum age of a request that Lambda sends to a function for processing.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MaximumRetryAttempts.description: The maximum number of times to retry when the function returns an error.
MaximumRetryAttempts.markdownDescription:
The maximum number of times to retry when the function returns an error.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Qualifier.description: The identifier of a version or alias.
Qualifier.markdownDescription:
The identifier of a version or alias.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(|[a-zA-Z0-9$_-]{1,129})$  
Update requires: Replacement
